mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.merchant_num AS "merchantNum", a.wechat_url AS "wechatUrl", a.business_license AS "businessLicense", a.merchant_name AS "merchantName", a.merchant_address AS "merchantAddress", a.merchant_legal_person AS "merchantLegalPerson", a.booking_person AS "bookingPerson", a.telphone AS "telphone", a.debit_rate AS "debitRate", a.credit_rate AS "creditRate", a.foreign_rate AS "foreignRate", a.id_card AS "idCard", a.bank_card AS "bankCard", a.bank_card_account_bank AS "bankCardAccountBank", a.salesman AS "salesman", a.merchat_desc AS "merchatDesc", a.office_id AS "office.id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", o18.name AS "office.name"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ter_merchant( id, merchant_num, wechat_url, business_license, merchant_name, merchant_address, merchant_legal_person, booking_person, telphone, debit_rate, credit_rate, foreign_rate, id_card, bank_card, bank_card_account_bank, salesman, merchat_desc, office_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{merchantNum}, #{wechatUrl}, #{businessLicense}, #{merchantName}, #{merchantAddress}, #{merchantLegalPerson}, #{bookingPerson}, #{telphone}, #{debitRate}, #{creditRate}, #{foreignRate}, #{idCard}, #{bankCard}, #{bankCardAccountBank}, #{salesman}, #{merchatDesc}, #{office.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
